location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Henry Hardy, in charge at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government of the balance present in the Bushire treasury upon the Captain's arrival at that station. It also reports that he does not expect to have to draw on the Governor of Bombay for funds prior to the arrival of the new Resident, so long as the commanders of the HC Cruizers do not make any demands of him.
